"Well I thought since my mother and sister had mentioned it you'd want to have sex and well i'm kind of scared because all my sisters said their first time really hurt" Diana says.

"We'll do it when you're ready Diana" you say. She walk over to the bed and lays down sweeping you up in her tail she brings you into arms reach and then hugs you to her chest. "Thanks John" she says.

"Anytime my precious eevee" you say. "Hey Diana do you have anything like a pair of pajamas I could use?" you ask. She silently walks over to one side of her room and rummages through a box, she comes back with a set of red doll pajamas. "Will these do John?" she asks. "Perfectly" you say slipping the pajamas on. Diana lays out on the bed and you climb up onto her and lay out just above her breasts. Diana then covers you with her tail, and you and her with the blanket tucking it up under you're chin.

"Good night John" Diana says, "Good night Diana" you reply. You fall asleep quite quickly snuggled up in the warmth.
1342111.title: Jolty finishes her shower and Diana takes you in

choices: Trixi staring down at you again
13421111.content:
You wake up and it's pitch black, as you're eyes adjust you swear you see something red staring at you, you rub you're eyes and look again. There is a pair of red eyes staring down at you yet you saw some kind of gentleness in them. You're just about to wake Diana when you're scooped up and you're mouth is covered. Whatever it is silently exits the Diana's room and enters another one confirming her as one of Diana's sisters. A light switch is flicked and you end up staring at an umbreon pokegirl. Her rings weren't glowing but what you saw were her 2 round eyes, she had a very nice hourglass figure like Diana and had a slightly smaller chest C or D instead of E but they fit her slim body really well. She walks over to the bed and places you down, you look around noticing the room was actually quite bare, there was a tv in one corner and a book case on one wall but otherwise nothing. The umbreon girl stares down at you for a few seconds before you say "hi?" As you say this her eyes light up and she dives forward snuggling against you and rubbing you against her cheek. You're able to push yourself back a bit and say "ok who in the heck are you?"

"Oh i'm Diana's eldest sister, my name is Trixi" she says.

"I'm John" you reply, "well Trixi I have to get going" you say getting up. You're pushed back down and held down with one hand, she lays her head down next to you "aww where you going cutie?" she asks in a cute voice.

"Back to bed" you say pushing against her hand.

"Oh welll you can just sleep with me" she says smiling.

"No offense but I already have a girlfriend, Diana so if you'll just excuse me" you say breaking free you start to slide down the bed sheet but are quickly grabbed,

"Aww you're trying to run away that is so cute, but that won't work" she says still smiling.

"Look no offense but I already had a few problems with Jolty i'd rather not have problems with you" you say.

"There'll be no problems" Trixi says crawling over her bed and curling up, and holding you to her breast. "Now go to sleep John, because you're not going to outlast me, I am a night pokemon" she says.

"What is with all of you and stealing people Diana likes?" you ask,

"Oh well the others were because I like having all eyes on me, but you i'm going to keep all for myself" she says looking down at you. She gives you a lick and moves back a bit "blech you taste like my sister, well i'm just going to have to override her" Trixi says starting to lick you. She licks you for 2 straight minutes before sniffing the air and saying "good you're mine now" before curling up again and falling asleep.

"Wow and I thought you were a nice pokemon" you whisper to yourself. You try to push you're way out but even asleep she has you stuck in an iron grip, so you just lay out an go to sleep. You wake up to the sun and Trixi looking down at you, "good morning" she says really happy.

"Good morning" you reply, you hear Trixi's door open and Jolty walks in, "Trixi mom says to come down for breakfast" she says.

"Hey" you yell, Jolty hears you and turns noticing you "hey trixi why is John in here?" she asks.

"He's mine now" she says getting between you and her sister, "this guy's really cute, and i'm not giving him up without a fight" she continues. You feel the hair on you're neck stand up and run to the other side of the bed as a bolt of electricity jumps off Jolty's fur and hits her sister. Trixi falls backwards stunned and Jolty scoops you up and bolts downstairs. She runs downstairs and into the kitchen where Juliette was consoling Diana since you had well disappeared. She drops you in front of Diana and a smile instantly springs to Diana's face however you freeze as you knew Trixi had reached downstairs. You slowly turn and she's standing in the kitchen entranceway, all of her rings glowing and a fiery look in her eyes. You dive forward and hide behind Diana but Juliette stands up and says "what's going on here."

"Where is he?" she asks calming down, "i'm just going to take him back to my room and continue what I was doing last night." she says.

"Oh so it was you who stole him" Juliette says staring down the umbreon girl.

"Yes I did, he's so cute, and I will have him" Trixi says, however Juliette stands between Trixi and Diana. "Do you have any idea how worried you made you're sister, she thought she had killed him" Juliette says. She stops for a second and looks down, "Really?" she asks. Juliette nods and Trixi calms right down, she slowly walks over to her sister who pushes you out of arms reach and says "i'm sorry Sis." Diana looks away and you just sit there, finally Diana sighs and says "I forgive you Sis, but never do that again, ok or I will make you pay." Trixi nods and you sigh. "Hey Jolty can you come here" you say, she walks over to you and you indicate for her to lean over. She does so she's near you and you reach up and give her a peck on the cheek, "thanks for giving me a hand" you say. Diana just looks at you dumbfounded, and Jolty blushes a little. "What? was that a bad thing to do?" you ask.

"You just kissed my sister!" she yells.

"Yeah, she gave me a hand, is it that big a deal?" you ask.

"Yes, what next are you going to make out with Trixi or my mother?" Diana yells clearly agitated.

"I'm ok with that" Juliette says but a withering glare from her daughter quiets her.

"Look i'm sorry, I didn't think you'd think it such a big deal" you say.

"I'll just give it back" Jolty says leaning down and kissing you. You swear her eyes shifted from brown to red for a second and she stands up. Her ears and tail droop and she rushes past her sister and mother and runs upstairs, you hear a door slam a few seconds afterwards.

"Ooh, someone's in trouble" Jolty says, you just stare at her and sigh, You jump down from the table onto a chair cushion and shimmy down the chair leg.

"John where are you going?" Juliette asks, "to fix this" you reply. It takes you a good ten minutes to get upstairs and then another minute to get to Diana's door. You're able to just squeeze under the doorframe by sucking in you're chest and you stand up in pitch blackness. Thankfully Diana's bed was straight from the door, that and you heard sniffling noises in front of you. You walk across the floor and climb the bed sheet, you're eyes slowly start adjusting to the light and you see Diana curled up around a pillow with her head buried into it. You walk over and give her a gentle poke, she turns and stares at you for a bit before snuggling you to her as tightly as possible.

"Blech, need air, can't breathe" you say and she lets up a bit letting you take in a few large breaths. "Look Diana i'm sorry, it wasn't one of my better judgement moments, so can you forgive me?" you say.

"No" she says shaking her head.

"Fine" you say snuggling up against her.

"John I said no what are you doing" she asks.

"You said I could snuggle with you at any time and i'm doing just that" you say.

"No John go away" she says pushing you away with one hand. You however just situate yourself next to her stomach and she pushes you away again. Getting up you walk around her and she seems to settle down, you reach the back of her head and reach up and start scratching her ears, she gives off a cute yelp and so you continue. After a minute you feel her tail against you and it wraps around you, you're then whipped forward around so that you're hanging in front of Diana's face.

"How dare you use my weakness against me" she says.

"Are you feeling better" is all you say in reply. She blushes a little and nods before leaning over and giving you a kiss.

"Blech you taste like Trixi" Diana says, she spends the next few minutes licking you then she drops you on the bed curls around you trapping you in her chest.

"So am I forgiven?" you ask again.

"Yes cutie you are, just never do that again" she says. "I won't" you reply,

"So how are you going to pay me back?" Diana asks.

"Oh come on, I already said I was sorry" you say.

"Ok, have it you're way no more tail blanket then" Diana says. "Oh come on that's cruel" you reply. "Fine" you say getting up you walk over and kiss her, "not good enough" she says, you were pretty sure she was smiling.

"Can you just tell me what you want Diana" you say.

"I want you to give me a tummy rub" she replies turning over so she's laying face up. You climb up and start rubbing and instantly she starts giving off a purring sound, you rub slowly making sure to pay extra attention to any spots that intensify the purring sound. After 5 minutes you sit down and ask "so can I have my tail blanket back?" You feel her tail droop over you and she says "what do you think cutie?"

"Ok well then i'm going to sleep for a bit since my rest was interrupted by Trixi" you say.

"Ok John have a nice nap" Diana says, as soon as you let you're breathing space out to fall asleep you feel her gently rub a finger over you're back. You fall asleep and wake up to
13421111.title: You wake up in the middle of the night

choices: You wake up to a flareon looking down at you
You wake up to a vaporeon looking down at you
134211111.content:
You wake up and the lights are on and you look over and see Jolty standing in the doorway.

"Well aren't you 2 just adorable" she says walking over. She walks over to the bed and sits down, "Mom wanted me to come up here and check on you, glad you 2 made up" she says.

"Well how could I stay mad at someone so cute" Diana says giving you a stroke not realizing you were awake. You just lay there trying to look asleep and Jolty asks her sister "so what do you think about him?"

"He's wonderful, I’ve never had someone who cares for me more. He also seems to love how fluffy I am" she says the last part with a giggle and gives her tail a flip.

"mmmm, I wish that luxray I dated had been as nice" she says.

"You'll find someone nice one of these days" Diana says.

"Maybe he has a brother" Jolty says laughing.

"Yeah then we could have a double wedding" Diana says laughing alongside her sister. You take this opportunity to sit up and pretend to yawn. "Did we wake you?" Diana asks.

"Yeah but it's fine, what are you talking about?" you say.

"Oh we were just talking about how it would be nice if you had a brother" Jolty says.

"That's nice" you say laying back against Diana's stomach. Jolty just stares at you, "hmm I wonder if we could get him to use double team, then there could be one for each of us" she says.

"Sorry I can't use any pokemon moves, besides I thought those were illusions" you say.

"Oh yeah" Jolty says her ears drooping a bit.

"Aw sis I can't stand to see you sad like that" Diana says, she picks you up off her chest and passes you over to Jolty. "Give him a hug it always makes me feel better" she says.

"What am I you're boyfriend or you're pet" you say

"My boyfriend of course" Diana replies "all you're doing is helping my sister." Jolty looks down at you before squeezing you tightly against her, after a bit you actually felt her start to loosen up and she places you down on the bed.

"Thanks Diana, thanks John" she says before leaving the room.

You turn to Diana and say "I hope she finds someone who will take care of her, that luxray sounded like a real jerk."

"You weren't sleeping were you?" Diana asks.

"I was until Jolty turned on the lights" you say standing up and walking closer to her, she turns over and looks down at you.

"So do you have a brother?" she asks.

"Yeah a twin actually, kind of miss him, he'd love this place, I know he'd take good care of Jolty" you say.

"Well hopefully he'll show up one day" Diana says, you smile at the thought and say "I hope he does too." You lay down next to her and she picks you up and nestles you in her chest.

"So John what part of my body do you like the best?" Diana asks

"Do I have to pick just one?" you ask

"Yes and it can't be my tail" she says

"I can't say any of my other answers then, they're all kinda perverted" you say blushing.

"Oh so you only like me for my body?" Diana asks raising an eyebrow.

"Of course not, you're funny, kind, energetic, cute, you took care of me without even knowing me, besides you make a good pillow" you say snuggling yourself as far into her fur as you can.

"So I’m just a really big pillow?" she asks.

"No, geez do you have selective hearing or what" you say.

"Nah it's just fun to play with you, I know you love me, and I love you too" she says curling herself up so you're surrounded by her body and her warmth. She looks down at you for a bit before saying "John wanna play a game,"

"Sure" you reply. She places you down on the bed and says "the game is simple if you can keep from being caught for a minute you can request something, if not I get to request something, oh and the playing area is the bed." "That is so cheap" you say before she yells "go" and dives at you. You jump out of the way and run for the top of the bed, she grabs onto you're foot with 2 fingers but you pull yourself out. Thinking you won't win this by conventional means you wait for her to dive again. She does and you dive toward her catching her off guard, you land near her arm and quickly climb up her back and onto her head. You begin rubbing her ears and instantly she goes limp giving off a small mrring sound. You rub her ears till you've counted to 50 and stop rubbing. She quickly stands up and you fall back onto the bed with an "oof," winded but not hurt. She looks at you and says "that's cheating using my only weakness against me."

"Oh look who's talking Ms limited playing area and much larger size" you retort.

"Fine, you win this round, what's you're request" she asks.

"Nothing, I think i'll just save it for later" you say.

"So you're just going to have it so that I owe you one?" Diana asks.

"Exactly" you reply "now let's start the next round so I have 2 favors instead of one." You walk over and stand on the other side of the bed and Diana yells "go" again. She slowly crawls forward like a cat stalking it's prey and she quickly has you stuck between herself and a pillar. "You're mine now" she says smiling. She dives forward and you're just able to dodge when you feel yourself land against her tail. Instantly it curls up around you and you're lifted up and held at face level. "Guess I win this round" Diana says smiling at you.

"Yeah yeah let me down" you say.

"Nah I think i'm just going to keep you there and save my request for later" Diana says smiling.

"Hey that's totally against the rules" you say, "this is revenge for taking advantage of my weakness" Diana says.

"You are totally taking advantage of the size difference" you say not really being able to do anything. You feel her tail let go and you fall into her waiting hands. She just looks down at you for a bit before snuggling you close to her chest. "Do you mind the size diffrence now?" she asks and even though you couldn't see it you were sure she was smiling.

"Well of course I don't mind it like this" you say, she pulls you back and says "well then you shouldn't mind the other stuff" before giving you a kiss. She stands up and walks downstairs where Juliette and Trixi are watching tv, Diana sits down next to her mother and puts you down between her and Trixi. You just sit there watching tv for a bit till you feel a weird feeling and look up and see Trixi staring down at you. "You're just so cute" she says leaning over and pulling you closer to her. You try to move back near Diana but she just holds you there and Diana seemed too involved in the show to notice. Trixi leans over and whispers "if you ever want to have some fun all night long just come find me" she says before giving you a quick nuzzle and sitting back up. You climb up into Diana's lap and just sit there for a while however you feel yourself lifted up after a bit and you float over more towards Juliette. You land in her lap and she reaches down and starts gently rubbing you're back with one finger while petting you're head with another. You started gettting a little peeved, not that you minded the attention but that fact that it seemed like you had to be the instigaor for Diana to get mad.

"Hey Diana" you say, she turns and sees you in her mother's lap, her petting and playing with you and she just smiles and says "Mom aren't you nice to take care of John."

"That's it" you say, you stand up and shimmy down the edge of the couch you then proceed to climb up the stairs even though it took a few minutes, you slipped under Diana's door and walk under the bed and lay down starting to think. A few minutes later you hear the door open and Diana walks in, she looks under the bed and spots you then asks "what are you doing down there?"

"being mad at you" you reply.

"What did I do" she says

"You're sister and mom were flaunting over me, you saw you're own mother petting me and you said "oh aren't you nice taking care of John." I know you care for me becuase of how mad you got when I kissed Jolty but a little reciprocation is necesscary" you say.

"So you're saying you want me to get mad at my mother and sisters when they show you a lot of attention" she says

"Well atleast like say hey or something I mean guys don't mind when they're girlfriend tells another girl to back up as he's already taken" you say.

"I'm not a very good girlfriend am I" Diana says.

"You're a good girlfriend just kind of oblivious at times" you say. You stand up and walk over to the edge of the bed, you climb up and motion for her to lay down next to you. She does so and you climb up her back and onto her head and rub her ears for a bit before giving her a back rub. "That means I forgive you" you say once you're finished.

"You're so nice John, how'd you get stuck with a girl like me" Diana says smiling.

"I'd have to say the same thing Diana" you reply.

She picks you up and holds you close before laying down trapping you underneath her. "I'm never letting you go John, are you ok with that?" she asks.

"Totally" you say, she leans down and gives you a kiss before laying her head down and falling asleep trapping you underneath her you fall asleep soon after as the combination of warmth and comfort was just too much.
134211111.title: Jolty turning the lights on

choices: Karen, and now she has leverage
Juliette and she looks kind of pissed
1342111111.content:
You slowly wake up, Diana's warm breath washing over you, you hear a rustle from behind you and look up and behind you at a cute looking flareon. She stares down at you and gently pulls you out from between Diana's breasts. You look up at her and are about to say something when she covers you're mouth with one finger and makes a shushing motion.

"So you're the human Trixi texted us about, she's right you are cute" she whispers.

"Thanks for the compliment, now if you'll excuse me that was really comfy" you say getting up and starting to walk back.

"Aww you won't even talk to me?" she asks.

"Sure, just give me a second, you jump onto Diana's head and start rubbing her ears.

"What are you doing?" the flareon whispers but stops as she hears Diana start to give off a faint mrring sound, "wake up sleepyhead, if you do you'll get all the ear rubs you want" you whisper into her ears. You jump down and you see her eyes flutter open, she leans forward and kisses you pushing you into the matress before looking up. She notices the flareon and sits up "Karen" she yells and tackle-hugs her sister.

"Good to see you too Sis" Karen says, pushing her sister off. "So this is John" she says indicating you.

"Yeah this is my boyfriend" Diana says pulling you close with her tail, she leans forward and gives you a squeeze.

"So, are you gonna try to steal me like Jolty and Trixi tried?" you ask bluntly.

"No John she isn't, Karen was the one person who gave me her full support" Diana says.

"Oh alright then" you say, you walk forward and reach out you're hand "I'm John nice to meet you."

"I'm Karen" she replies reaching forward with a finger and shaking you're hand. she leans further forward and quickly has you in a hug. "You're just so cute I can't stand it" she says giving you a lick.

"Karen put him down" Diana says, Karen does so and Diana pulls you back and surrounds you with her tail.

"So, what was that?" you ask.

"Sorry" Karen says blushing.

"Karen's problem is she is very liberal, and she doesn't try to steal my boyfriends but become more like a friend with benifits" Diana says.

"Oh ok, well i'm ok with the friend bit not so sure about the benifits part" you say.

"Oh come now it's not that bad to diversify" Karen says.

"Hmmm...now that I think about it" you say.

"Karen stop giving him weird ideas" Diana says.

"Do you have a problem with me being with more then just you at one time" you ask her.

"Of course I do" Diana replies, "you're mine and mine alone. I'm not letting anyone else have you, you will sleep with me, bathe with me, and eventually be my children's father" she says.

"Well there's you're answer Karen" you say smiling.

"Sis that's no fun" Karen says.

"I don't care Karen, he's mine and mine alone, besides what happened to those keckleon brothers you were seeing?" Diana asks.

"They weren't too happy when I suggested a few different ideas to them" Karen replies.

"I really don't want to know" you say.

"Yeah Karen we'd rather not know about that kind of thing" Diana says, Karen leans over staring right at you, "Diana can I hug him again?" she asks. You hear the door open and Jolty, Trixi, and Juliette walk in.

"Oh so this is where you were Karen" Jolty says. "You're not bugging Diana and John are you?" Juliette says.

"I was just suggesting some ideas" Karen replies.

"Well come on sis we should leave them alone" Jolty says, she grabs Karen's right arm and Trixi grabs her left arm. They start dragging her out of the room but she breaks free and dives toward you, she grabs you and jumps onto a window ledge. "Karen what are you doing?" Diana says.

"Sorry sis, but he's just so cute, i'll bring him back in an hour" she says jumping out the window. You don't even scream as she falls and lands unfazed, she holds you close and you feel her speeding up as she uses agility. You feel her stop running after a while and you look up at her.

"Hey what are you doing?" you yell.

"I'm sorry John, you're just so cute, don't worry I won't try to steal any of you're firsts" she says snuggling against you. "All I want is to do is hold you for an hour, is that ok?" she asks.

"Well I guess so" you say. She snuggles you into her chest and wraps herself up in her tail like Diana does. You lay there for a 5 minutes till you hear a rustling in the bushes, you and Karen look up to see a group of 3 vulpix staring down at her, Karen quickly gets up and jumps back. Without warning the 3 vulpix shoot out a combined flamethrower that Karen just dodges. "What the hells they're problem?" Karen says as she starts running.

"I remember Diana saying she fought off a group of 3 vulpix when she first found me" you say, Karen keeps running as why they were there was obvious, they wanted you back. Karen runs into a park and she turns toward the 3 vulpix who quickly caught up.

"You're the sister of that girl who took him from us, just hand him over and you can leave unharmed" the leader says.

"Sorry I can't do that, my sister loves him and he loves her" Karen replies.

"Well then I guess we'll have to do this by force" the lead vulpix says, they start advancing when the one in the back is blindsided by a shadow ball, the 2nd one is hit by a thunderbolt and the leader starts floating in the air. You see Jolty, Trixi, Juliette, and Diana running toward you and Juliette stops near the leader.

"My daughter said he's already spoken for, so are you going to leave now?" she asks. The vulpix nods and Juliette lets her down, "this isn't over" she yells as her and the other 2 run away. Karen holds you out for Diana and she scoops you up in a hug, "are you ok?" she asks.

"Perfectly fine, she didn't try anything, just wanted a really long hug" you reply. Diana lowers you into her chest and turns to her sister and stares at her "he seems ok, and you didn't just hand him over to those vulpix so I guess I can forgive you" Diana says. They hug and you say "still here, no room, need air," they break the hug and Karen giggles. "Sorry John" Diana says.

"Geez you're more dangerous then you're sisters" you say trying to pull yourself out but you can't. Diana giggles and you assume they started walking home, you had to admit it was really comfy where you were if a bit restrictive. You all reach home and Diana fishes you out of her chest, "did you like the ride?" she asks.

"No offence but next time let me sit on you're shoulder or something it was comfy yet way too cramped" you say moving around trying to get rid of the stiffnes sin you're back.

"Aww, well let me fix that" she says, she places you down on her palm and starts rubbing you're back with one finger.

"That feels great" you say as the rubbing removed all the tension and cramps in you're body. She stops and you sit up, "that felt great, although i'm a bit hungry" you say.

"Oh well that's easily taken care of" Diana replies. She walks into the kitchen and puts you down on the counter before grabbing a jar out of a cupboard, "Mom says my sisters aren't supposed to know about this jar but you're not any of my sisters" she says. She opens the jar and inside is a bunch of pokeblock.

"I don't think I can eat that, that's more pokemon food" you say.

"Oh right, let me see" she says running her finger over a bunch of jars she grabs one that looks like a wailord and opens it. "Ahh here we go" she says she pulls something out of the jar and puts it back. "Here you go" she says and passes you an oatmeal-raisin cookie as big as you were. You quickly eat about half the cookie and lay back stuffed as can be.

"I can't eat another bite" you say

"Don't tell mom I gave you that cookie, those are kind of her cookies and she doesn't like people eating them" Diana says.

"Oh come on it can't be that bad" you say.

"The last time someone ate one we had to scatter and hide out in the woods for a few days" Diana says. You both hear a noise and it's
1342111111.title: You wake up to a flareon looking down at you

13421111112.content:
Diana slowly turns around and you see Juliette standing there but her eyes were literally glowing red.

"Diana, is that my jar of cookies?" Juliette asks so calmly that you could do nothing but stand there in fear.

"Um....y..y...yes it is, John was hungry, and I can't give him any pokeblock" Diana replies backing up a bit.

"But those are my cookies" Juliette says "and you know how I don't like people eating my cookies" she continues walking forward,

"It was John's fault you should punish him" Diana says putting her hands forward. Juliette walks forward and smiles down at you "well if you do the crime then you have to do the time" she says smiling wickedly. She picks you up between 2 fingers, then she runs upstairs into her bedroom. Juliette shuts the door behind her and puts you down on the bed before laying down in front of you staring intently at you. You just stand there frozen in fear till she starts laughing her head off, you go from being scared to being confused in under a second.

"I can't believe you 2 were so scared" she says still laughing.

"So you're not going to do anything to me?" you ask.

"No i'm not, you mean a lot to Diana so I won't touch you, although i'll need you're help with a plan" she says smiling.

"Um....what?" you ask.

"Well you saw how scared of me she was, that really saddens me as a mother, plus you saw how easily she gave you up to me" Juliette says.

"Yeah, so did you actually make them scatter the last time you found someone eating a cookie" you ask.

"No, that was the day the girls went off to college and they tricked Diana into believing that story, she hid out in the woods for 3 days because of it" she replies.

"So John, my plan is for you to well just scream and sound like you're in pain or anguish so Diana comes running" Juliette says.

"I don't want to trick her" you say.

"Well I could always put you in real pain" Juliette says.

"Ok, ok, I get the point i'll go along with you're plan" you say. "Good boy, I can see why Diana likes you" Juliette says tapping you on the head with a finger. "Just give me a second" Juliette says, she sits down in a meditative position and a few seconds later you hear someone outside the door and you hear Diana whisper "John are you ok?"

Juliette pushes you over so that it seems like she was crushing you under her chest and she whispers "start screaming."

You start screaming you're head off trying to sound like you're in as much pain as possible. Not even a second after you start screaming Diana busted through the door and had tackled her own mother. You look up and you see a look of pure anger on Diana's face and you run up and pull on her tail. "Diana settle down, i'm ok, she didn't hurt me, it was a trick" you yell. Diana turns to you and her expression quickly changes from anger to relief and she jumps toward you and lands on the bed. Diana starts crying and cuddles you against her cheek.

Finally you're placed back into the center of the bed and you all hear an audible gurgle come from Rydia, "Sorry I guess i'm hungry" she says.

"That's fine, I think some food will do us some good right now" you say. Serina and Trish stand up and go over to the pantry and stove and start fixing up breakfast. You look up and you see Tina staring down at you, her tail gently wraps around you and she lifts you up to face level, she just stares at you for a few seconds before gently squeezing you with her tail and tickling you're face with her tongue. You're then passed over to Chia who plops you down in her chest and squeezes her chest together so that it surrounds you. "as long as I can do this i'll always take care of you" she says. You're passed over to Cindy who instantly has her tail curled around you and she actually throws you upward with it and catches you. "Just remember we'll always be here to catch you when you fall" she says giving you a little kiss. "Can we just go with a metaphor next time" you say sitting up. "I liked my way better" she replies with a smile on her face. Finally you're passed over to Rydia who holds you close to her and she starts radiating heat, the thing is she covers the part where you are with flame, "Oh let me guess this represents the you're fiery love" you say.

"Yes, now be quiet and enjoy it" Rydia says flaring up in heat for a second causing you to jump. She places you back down on the bed however you don't stay there for long as you feel yourself lifted up by Psychic and you float behind Trish and Serina as they set plates of food down on the table. You are set down in front of Serina's place as she sits down and leans forward trapping you between her chest and the plate. "What are you doing?" you ask her.

"Making sure you can't get away" she says smiling.

"Why in the name of everything good in the world would I want to leave" you say. Serina then gently leans down and gives you a kiss, "that's the right answer" she says smiling. You smile back and for the next few minutes the table is silent as everyone eats, you eat you're alloted portion of serina meal and just lay back against her once you're finished. As soon as everyone is done eating you stand up and say "I've known some of you longer then others, but all of you have taken care of me and opened you're hearts to me, and all I can say is thank you" you say before sitting back down.

"Hey stop getting so sentimental on us, you aren't going anywhere for a long time" Trish says smiling. Everyone else nods in agreement and you get a little squeeze from Serina. After the plates have been cleaned Serina is sitting in her chair by the fireplace with you on her lap when Tina walks up and says to everyone in the mood "no offense guys but this place feels a little dreary let's all go play somewhere."

"Alright well where should we go?" Rydia asks,

"How about the forest clearing?" Trish suggests. Everyone shouts their enthusiasm and soon you're off with Serina carrying a small basket of food one arm and you in her other hand. You quickly reach the clearing and Serina sets up a blanket. You lay down but are quickly surrounded, "Come on John we want to play" Chia says grabbing you with a vine whip. However you're grabbed out by Cindy and she scampers up a tree with you held in her tail. She stops on the highest branch and hides in the leaves. "Well John looks like it's just you and me" she says smiling at you. She nuzzles you for a bit and places you down on her stomach.

"Hey isn't this kind of hogging?" you say.

"Yeah it is, but I really don't mind" she says giggling, "besides I can carry you in my tail all I want" she says. You feel gravity leave you and you fly out of the trees. Cindy jumps out after you and grabs you out of the air. She starts glowing as well and you both float down to the ground. "Cindy no hogging John" Serina says as you land on the ground.

"Yes Mom" she replies sticking her tongue out at Serina.

"Isn't there anything we can do together?" you ask.

"Well we could just take a walk through the wood" Trish says. She scoops you up and you just start walking around, you see a waterfall, a river, and a number of other clearings but actually you don't see any other pokemon.

"So how come we haven't seen any other pokemon?" you ask.

"Well pokemon here are very spread out, the fact you've met so many different varieties is actually really suprising" Tina says.

"Really, so why are all of you so close together?" you ask.

"We all like the forest, it's peaceful and supposed to be large enough so you don't run into any other pokemon" Chia says.

"Well i'm glad you all chose to live in the forest" you say. You walk back to the clearing and have a snack which was just a few oran berries. They were pretty much a meal for you though, you spent the next hour playing tag, thing is it was more like capture the flag with you as the flag. You were passed around so many times in that hour you thought you were gonna be sick a couple of times. You're about to leave the forest when suddenly
1521111121122121111.title: Morning, the aftermath and playful pokemon

choices: You get to the hot springs without trouble
A few pokemon protect the springs
15211111211221211112.content:
The group walks out into the small clearing between the forest and Serina's house and as you approach Serina's house you see a bunch of figures standing near Rydia's tent. The group quickens pace and as you get closer you see it's a group of about 10 rapidash and ponyta pokegirls. Instantly Trish holds her hands to her chest and covers you with her ears, there's a little place where the ears meet because they're in a v-shape that you stick you're head out of.

Serina runs up and says "who are you? and why are you here?" The rest of the group quickly catches up to her.

All the rapidash turn as a whole and a ponyta walks up to Serina and says "we're looking for my big sis Rydia." Rydia walks forward and the little ponyta runs up and hugs her. You smile for a bit before Rydia says "Jane what are you and the rest doing here, go home."

"But, but we came to bring you back" Jane says and you see tears welling up in her eyes. Rydia just turns around and the ponyta girl starts crying. "Aww Rydia you made her cry" you yell and instantly regret it as not only does the ponyta girl stop crying but all of them are now staring at Trish. You quickly hide yourself cursing you're actions and you just lay there. You stick you're head out a tiny bit and you see that they have converged around Trish, the largest rapidash of the group steps out and says "Hello Trish."

"Hi Mrs.Flametail" Trish replies.

"It's nice to see you all doing well, so what was that voice we heard" Mrs.Flametail says cutting to the point.

"It was just me, my voice cracks when I yell really loud" Trish replies.

"Oh, and why are you holding you're chest then dear" Mrs.Flametail says walking forward.

"Oh nothing..."Trish says before turning around and making a break for it. Being a bunny she heads for Serina's cabin and jumps landing on the roof. The Rapidash surround the house and just stare up at her.

"Just show us what you're hiding dear and we'll leave" Mrs.Flametail says.

"No way, you're just going to try to steal it" Trish says, you were a little offended being called an it but you know why she said it.

"I think prolonging it will just make it worse" you whisper.

"Maybe but they're not getting you as long as I live" Trish whispers back.

"If you trust me, jump back down and let me down on the ground, I can handle this" you say.

Trish makes an amazing jump landing near the others who had convereged as a group, the rapidash and ponyta run up and Trish slowly lets go of her chest and places you down on the grass. You motion to Rydia to come over and she scoops you up and walks forward, "this is the reason I haven't come home, his name is John" Rydia says. The group lets out a collective gasp and then Jane runs up and says "he's so cute". She makes a motion to her sister to pass you down to her and Rydia just raises you above her head, "no way pipsqueak he's too fragile for someone like you to be near him." You feel yourself lifted out of Rydia's palm and you float over to Serina, Cindy and Tina stand on either side of her acting as bodyguards.

"There you saw why i'm not coming back, go home" Rydia says to the herd.

"How can we let you keep something so cute to yourself" Mrs.Flametail says.

"I don't keep him to myself I have to share him with the others, besides he's happy with us" Rydia says.

"I suggest a contest to see how this goes, if we win we get to atleast play with him a bit, if you win we'll leave" Mrs.Flametail says.

"We control everything, just go away mom, I know you've been lonely ever since Dad died but stealing him won't fill the hole" Rydia says.

"Oh my, what's this, the cabin is made of wood, oh and what are we a herd of fire pokemon" Mrs.Flametail says.

"BITCH" you yell, Serina walks up and says "John chooses to be with us, Mrs.Flametail please leave I don't want this to get ugly."

"It won't have to be dear, Rydia just has to beat me in a race and we'll leave" she says smiling.

"Ahem, Mrs.Flametail was it?" you say standing on the edge of Serina's palm she lowers her face and says "yes dear."

"Look, you are causing us a lot of problems, please just go away, no offense but if Rydia thought you could be trusted near me we would have met on much better terms." you say. You're pushed back by a snort of warm air and she whispers "you either race or we burn the house down and once we win i'm going to have so much fun with you."

Getting pissed you yell "Rydia take the challenge and take this bitch down."

Rydia nods and says "fine we accept what's the course."

"It'll be a sheer test of speed so from here to that tree" Mrs.flametail says indicating a lone tree on the edge of the forest. In a moment the 2 were at the starting point and the race began, you saw Rydia trail behind for a second as Serina yelled "start" but she quickly caught up and overtook her mother reaching the tree first. The herd starts walking away as soon as Rydia wins and you had to admit you felt kind of bad for Rydia's little sister since she didn't seem so bad. Rydia runs up and you jump over to her giving her a hug "great running" you say, "thanks" she replies. "So why is you're mom such a bitch?" you ask.

"Well she's not normally it's just ever since Dad died she fixates on any man she sees" Rydia says.

"She said she was going to burn Serina's cabin down or if she won had some "fun" with me in air quotes" you say.

"Well then it's a good thing I won isn't it" Rydia replies smiling. The others run up and hug Rydia and you go inside the cabin, when you get in Serina places you down on the floor and you notice that the door of the closet you had hid in was open. You look inside and see something cream colored sitting there curled up, you call Tina over since she was closest and she opens the door fully. Sitting in the closet was Rydia's little sister Jane, she slowly gets up and you can feel the daggers coming off Rydia.

"Jane what are you doing here?" Rydia yells.

"I just wanted to see John" she says looking down at her.

"Aww don't be so hard on her, she doesn't seem so bad" you say. You're scooped up by the girl and hugged against her face way too tightly "aww you're so cute" she says.

"I'll just let you eat you're words for a bit John" Rydia says smiling. The young ponyta girl proceeds to try to pet you, almost sit on you and generally be a young annoying girl. Finally Tina whips her tail around you and pulls you away from the little girl right as the door to the cabin bursts open. Standing there is Mrs.Flametail, she quietly walks in, grabs her daughter and leaves.

"Ouch" is all you say rubbing you're slightly bruised limbs.

"I told you she was rough" Rydia says,

"Next time I am definitley listening" you say, Tina hugs you to her chest and tries to stroke you're back but you give out a cry causing her to stop.

"Sorry" you say "i'm not really feeling all that good after that" you continue. Chia and Cindy walk up with giant smiles on their faces, "we were going to save this as a suprise but since you could probably use it now we'll tell you" Chia says.

"What?" you ask.

"Well there's a small mountain range near here and one day me and Cindy were just out exploring and we found something" Chia continues.

"Please just say it" you say being a bit tired.

"We found.....Hot springs" Chia says. Instantly you spring up and say "Let's go then."

"Everyone else fine with that?" Cindy asks. They all nod, and you set off although Serina grabs a few towels out of a cupboard before you leave.
15211111211221211112.title: You run into Rydia's herd

152111112112212111121.content:
Cindy picks you up and you leave for the hotsprings, she leads the group for about 10 minutes till you reach the mountain range she was talking about. Cindy holds you close to her as she starts walking up a small path and within 2 minutes the air becomes more moist and warmer. She rounds a turn in the rock and sitting right in front of you are the hot springs. Cindy lowers her hand to the ground as the others round the bend, Tina lets out a small gasp as the hot springs were gigantic filling a large crater and a bunch of smaller ones.

"Hey Serina do you have anything like a pair of swimming trunks?" you ask.

"No John I don't, guess you're gonna have to skinny dip" Serina says with a large smile on her face.

'Fine" you say starting to undress, although you move further away as Tina, Cindy, and Chia were staring at you. You walk behind a rock and strip placing you're clothes on the ground you run and dive into the water. You sigh as you're head exits the water and Trish slips into the water near you and gives off a sigh. The other girls enter the water each giving off a sigh as they immerse themsleves in the warm water. You lazily swim around trying to hide as much of yourself as possible however Trish simply dives and swims underneath you. She surfaces and giggles a bit "you're so small" she says between giggles. For some reason this comment really depressed you so you stop swimming, close you're eyes and let you're weight carry you under the water. You feel yourself lifted up and you open you're eyes and you're on Trish's palm with her looking down at you. "I'm sorry about the comment John don't be depressed" she says hugging you. "It's ok Trish, just can you keep comments like that to yourself next time" you say.

"Alright John, but you do remember I like small cute things?" she says.

"Yeah I do Trish" you stand up and dive off her hand into the water and start swimming again. You see a shape quickly move through the water and Tina pops up in front of you. "These springs are great, they take the stress right out of you" she says laying back in the water giving you a full view of her body. You blush and just keep swimming but she pops up quickly in front of you so you run into her.

"Oh well aren't we bold" Tina says smiling, she lays down in the water and indicates for you to climb onto her back. You do so and she says "hold on tight." Diving under the water she starts well flowing through it like a dragon would. She completes a lap around the edge of the spring and then stands up letting you fall back into the water.

"Oh now you're trying to get a peek at the rest of me you little perv" Tina says jokingly.

"Might as well, i've never seen such a beautiful dragonair" you reply causing her to blush. Chia cannonballs into the spring pushing you under with her wave but she pulls you out of the water and close to her with a vine whip. "Aww well aren't you cute with no clothes on" Chia says giggling. She hugs you close to her chest and slowly let's her body fall into the spring till she's mostly sitting down but you're still above the water. "This is just heaven" she says sitting there "good friends, soaking in a hotspring and a cute little man all for me" she continues smiling.

"Hey I am no pet" you retort.

"Fine my little flower, but you're not getting away from me" Chia says smiling. You resign yourself to you're fate and turn around and lay back. You had to admit it felt really good being surrounded by the warmth of the hot spring as well as the warmth Chia was giving off. You lay like this for a while till you feel something fall over you're back. You look behind you and Chia had fallen asleep from the warmth of the spring, you feel the same feeling on you're front this time and look around. You notice Cindy's tail sticking out of the water and that it was hitting you before it hits you again. Suddenly the rest of her pops out of the spring and she looks down at you "having fun?" she asks.

"Yeah I am actually, what can't get you're tail wet?" you ask as it still hadn't touched the water.

"Well no I can't it's where all my electricity is stored" Cindy says, she sits down with her tail on the rock and sighs "wish I could though my tail always feels kind of lonely not being able to swim with the rest of my body."

"Well then why don't I keep it company" you say, you get out of the spring and Cindy grabs a towel which she hands to you, you dry off quickly and gently tap her tail with you're foot. You're not electrocuted so you lay down and get comfy while Cindy splashes her feet in the water.

"Thanks John, my tail feels a lot less lonely" she says giggling. "No problem" you reply, you look around and everyone was just sitting around enjoying the spring. You didn't notice Serina however and you just turn to look behind her and she's staring at you at close range. "Ahhh" you yell and jump back a bit startled, she giggles and says "you're pretty cute like that John."

"Don't do that" you say, Serina laughs out loud this time and Cindy turns around and notices her. You feel Cindy's tail wrap around you and Serina says "aw come on Cindy everyone's gotten some time with him but me."

"He's with me right now Serina come back in 10 minutes" Cindy replies. Serina gets up and walks off and Cindy leans over and gives you a hug. You lay back against her tail and Cindy lays down facing you, she gently strokes you with a finger and you had to admit the combination of the warmth of the spring as well as the comfort of her stroking and tail were quickly lulling you to sleep. You stay awake however and Serina shows up after you assume the 10 minutes saying "ok cindy it's been 10 minutes let me have some time with him."

"Fine" Cindy says picking you up off her tail and passing you to Serina. Serina walks into the spring and her horn transforms into that small platform she places you on top of it before submerging herself. She lays back and you're weight holds you on the platform, the water covers you up to you're neck so you just sit back and relax. Cindy reaches over and strokes you're back and you give off a sigh, "Chia was so right, this is the good life" you say.

"Glad you're enjoying it, we should come here atleast once a week" Cindy says.

"That would be excellent" you say standing up. You all laze around the hot springs for a few hours not doing much. You went from from sunning on Cindy's tail to having mini races with Tina and Rydia to just laying in the spring with Trish, Chia and Serina. Finally as the sun is setting you pack up and head back to Serina's cabin, Serina had picked you up and started walking into the cabin when Rydia taps her on the shoulder. "Where do you think you're going with John?" she asks.

"To bed of course" Serina replies.

"John gets to sleep with us tonight rememebr?" Rydia says.

Serina looks down glumly before saying "don't do anything too bad with him ok? i'm trusting you on this." She hands you over to Rydia who nods and heads into the tent.

The other girls follow into the tent and Rydia says "ok well since John had a nightmare last night we should stay close to him any objections?" No one objected and they quickly surround you. They set up the sleeping bags in a square around you, each girl covered you gently with one hand while you used Cindy's tail as a matress. You had to admit it felt really very safe and you quickly fell asleep. They all quickly fall asleep and you just lay there for a bit worried that you'll have another nightmare. Finally you fall asleep and you had the same nightmare. You wake up and figure out you really need to get this sorted out. You fall back asleep quickly becuase of the feeling of safety and you figure that you need to confront whatever was causing these nightmares.
152111112112212111121.title: You get to the hot springs without trouble

choices: A mansion fit for a king
A slightly bigger cabin large enough to hold everyone
1521111121122121111211.content:
You wake up early in the morning and you look over yourself, you weren't shaking and you hadn't cried out in the night so you were sure they wouldn't know you had the dream. You notice Tina stirring and she slowly stretches, she looks over at you and you see a frown spread across her face. She reaches over and gently picks you up off Cindy's tail and lovingly hugs you into her chest, "I'm sorry we couldn't help John" she says.

"What are you talking about?" you ask feigning ignorance.

"You had that dream again didn't you, you're eyes are all red" Tina says. She snuggles you further in and whispers "John i'm sorry if my teasing bothers you."

"Tina it's ok" you say as you lay you're head forward and say "thanks for noticing though, i'm gonna need each of you to help me beat this." Tina nods and puts you back down on Cindy's tail, she then starts shaking each of the others girls awake. They all start awakening with Rydia mumbling something about just getting to the good part. They all turn towards you and within seconds you're in the middle of a 3-way hug, after a minute they let go and you just sit back.

"John are you ok? it's not us is it?" Cindy asks.

"No it's not you, I think meeting Amanda made me realize just how powerless I am and that it's you're kindness that's saved me" you say. "In essence i'm scared of losing you all and then ending up at the mercy of someone like Amanda" you continue. You feel Cindy's tail wrap around you and she leans over "we're sorry John if we weren't so selfish this wouldn't have happened."

"It's not you're fault, besides i'd rather have the fear then not me you and Chia" you reply. Rydia reaches over and scoops you out of Cind'y tail, "Serina needs to hear about this" she says placing you in her palm and standing up. Rydia exits the tent and heads into the cabin as the other girls follow. Rydia walks up to the bed and shakes Serina awake, she opens her eyes slowly till she notices you and her eyes snap open. She reaches forward and gently pulls you out of Rydia's hand and snuggles you up against her chest.

"You had that nightmare again didn't you John?" she asks.

"Yeah" you reply, Trish starts to slowly get up and she looks around kind of confused that everyone was just standing there letting Serina hug you. You turn to her and she instantly rushes forward and hugs you close "ohhh John" she says holding you tightly yet not tight enough to hurt you. You just lay you're head down and stay like that for a bit before Trish places you down on the bed and they crowd around you.

"John do you really want to get rid of this?" Serina asks.

"Yeah I do, this is really bugging me because honestly it is making me fearful when I shouldn't be" you reply

"Ok well I can help but you're going to have to trust me" Serina says she walks over to a drawer and pulls out a flute.

"Hey isn't that the azure flute?" you ask.

"Yes it is" Serina says starting to play the flute, you're vision starts to black and you seem to wake up in a field of flowers. You lok around panicking for a second as there seems to be nobody, you calm down as you see a figure in the distance. You quickly recognize the figure as an anthro version of Arceus easily recognizable by the yellow ring around her chest. You had to admit she looked very beautiful as her body was proportioned perfectly and you couldn't stop staring. She keeps walking towards you and seems to not notice you till she's standing right in front of you. She bends down and lowers her palm to the ground, you climb on without a second thought.

"So you're the one I brought over, you're cuter than I expected" she says smiling.

"It's a pleasure to meet you Arceus sir....uh mam" you say correcting yourself quickly.

"Oh don't worry about the pleasentries just call me Arceus" she says smiling. "Well no one ever shows up here just to talk so what's wrong?" she asks.

"Well you probably know about everything that's happened to me and that incident with Amanda the milotic" you say slowly.

"She always was a drama queen" Arceus replies "and?"

"Well I can say this since i'm talking to you, it left me not only afraid of being left alone but well also of the inhabitants of you're world in general" you say.

"So you're afraid of pokemon now? but you didn't hesitate when getting near me?" she asks

"Well only those I don't really know, and you're Arceus I wouldn't even be here if not for you plus you're always depicted as a very friendly pokemon" you reply.

"Well thank you" she replies, she seems to think for a second before saying "well I could just get rid of you're fear but I keep hearing men don't like having things given to them" Arceus says.

"That's ok" you say.

"I'll just help you conquer you're fear, you'll get a reward if you do" Arceus says smiling gently. You're teleported you assume about 10 metres in front of Arceus and she starts transforming soon standing in front of you as Amanda the milotic and she's about 10 times as large as she was and you were scared enough of her as it was.

"All you have to do is be able to punch her" Arceus-amanda says smiling down at you. You however just stand there frozen in terror, "move, this is Arceus not Amanda she won't hurt you" you say. A hydro pump that would have annihalated you hits the ground about a metre next to you.

"If you're just gonna stand there i'm going to get more accurate" she says. "There's no way I can do this on my own, heck the only reason I was able to stand up to her was because I had Cindy and Chia's help" you think starting to let yourself fall in despair. You hear Arceus' voice in you're head "relying on others isn't a weakness, let it be you're strength" she says. Instantly in you're hands appear 6 shrunken pokeballs, you hit the buttons and throw em, out pops Serina, Trish, Cindy, Chia, Rydia and Tina. They lean down "we believe in you John, we have you're back" they say before disappearing. Instantly you feel 1000x more confident, you turn towards Arceus-Amanda and yell "You're going down." You charge towards her closing the distance suprisingly quickly, she moves to punch you but you don't stop and she hits in front of you. You jump onto her arm and run up it jumping off at the shoulder. You sail towards her and punch her square between the eyes with all you're strength, you start falling back towards the ground but you're caught in Arceus' open palm.

"Owww, that actually hurt" she says rubbing the place where you hit with one hand.

"Sorry" you say.

"Why be sorry, that just shows how much you believed in them" Arceus replies. A young growlithe pokemorph appears in front of her and Arceus gently hands you over. You just sit there as the growlithe licks you, you then climb up onto her head and give her an ear scratch.

"Well you seem cured" Arceus says smiling.

"Yeah I feel a lot better, thank you" you say bowing to her.

"Courteous as well as cute, I may just keep you for myself" she says smiling.

"Well that wouldn't be so bad but I think it would make all those pokemon who care about me a bit sad" you reply.

"You're right besides it's about time for a change of scenery" Arceus says. You start wondering about what she means when you're vision blacks again. You wake up and you're laying on Serina's bed with them all staring down at you.

"John you're ok" Serina squeals gleefully as you wake up "you passed out right after I played the flute what happened?" she asks.

"I met Arceus, she helped cure me and then said something about a change of scenery" you reply. Suddenly there's a knock on the door and you stand up "no way" you think to yourself. Rydia runs to the door and opens it, standing there in the flesh was the goddess of all pokemon.

"May I come in?" asks Arceus, everyone including you just stands there stunned. She slowly walks in, "why do you all look so shocked especially you John I told you i'd like a change of scenery."

"I didn't expect you to come here" you reply.

"Oh but you're just so small and cute besides why should everyone but me get some fun with you" she says smiling.

"Um Ms Arceus?" Serina asks.

"Yes Serina" Arceus replies, Serina backs up a bit obviously shocked at being called by name.

"Um....we're sorry but there's no room for you here, we were already stretched thin using the tent in the yard" Serina says.

"Oh well we can't have that" Arceus says, you all float outside the cabin and she walks out and snaps her finger turning the cabin into.....
1521111121122121111211.title: The morning and confronting demons

choices: You spend the night with Arceus
They hide you and you sleep with everyone else
15211111211221211112111.content:
A mansion, as the light fades you instantly recognize the shape and size of the building. Thing is this was no ordanairy mansion, this was one fit for Arceus . For a normal sized pokemon it would have been huge but to you it was like a small country. Arceus sets everyone but you down, you float over till you're right in front of her and she just holds you there.

"What did you just do to my house?" Serina yells.

"I'm sorry Serina but i'm kind of picky about where i'll live" Arceus says.

"Well....it's ok I guess but why does it have to be so big, I mean what if we lose John in it?" Serina asks.

"Oh that won't be a problem" Arceus says, you feel a heat around you're neck and you see a ring with a small arrow appear on each girls finger. You look down and there's a red collar around you're neck.

"There, those rings will always point to where John is even if he's near one of you" Arceus says.

"So uh what's with the collar?" you ask.

"I thought it'd look cute on you" Arceus says.

"Please take it off" you say. You feel the same heat and you look down and it's gone. You look up and Arceus is staring at you "why didn't you like my gift?" she asks.

"I don't deal well with people trying to assert some kind of dominance over me" you say, "i'm fine with being friends or more but due to free will not because one person has power" you continue.

"Noble little guy aren't you" Arceus says. She leans over and kisses you "I think this will be a lot of fun" she says.

"Ahem, Arceus can we tour the mansion now" Serina says. You turn and you can see her holding the anger back.

"I think that's a great idea" Arceus says. She walks forward with you floating next to her and everyone follows. The mansion had entirely marble floors, a giant kitchen with a center island, indoor pool, 2 game rooms one for things like pool and much to you're suprise one filled with various game systems, there was a bedroom specalized for each pokemon like for example there was a bunch of pillows Cindy could lie on or bury into in her bedroom. "So where's my bedroom?" you ask.

"I'll get him something to eat" Chia says grabbing you with a vine whip and running off. She runs straight for the kitchen and starts looking around. "Is there anything you'd prefer Hohn, meat, bread, maybe some vegetables?" Chia asks.

You stop eating for a second to think "Chia, none of you could be replaced, even by Arceus" you say.

"Of course, you're each an individual and I love each and every one of you" you yell to get you're point across.

"We love you too" you hear come from behind you. You turn to see everyone else standing there staring at you, they run up and you're scooped off the fruit bowl and passed around each girl hugging you in turn.

"You all can go play with him till the night" Arceus says. Cindy who was holding you leads the pack as they run to the video game room and you're put down. Cindy starts the system up and grabs a controller while she passes you one that's you're size.

You play as an adventurer which was a human male, this suprised you and Tina played as you're travelling companion. "Arceus, stop crying" you say. She starts floating in one direction and you in another, "goodbye John, i'm one of those mean girls who you hate so i'll just leave" Arceus says.

You reach in front of her and walk forward like there's an invisible staircase till you're standing right in front of her face "you are Arceus, the one pokemon I expect everything from but even you have faults" you say. "You are not leaving because that's running and I won't allow that, now be the beautiful, kind, loving pokegirl I love, and even if you aren't I still want you by my side" you say kissing Arceus' lips.
